name: MTLCaptureDescriptor
desc: A configuration for a Metal capture session.

items.name: var captureObject: Any?
items.desc: The object whose contents should be captured.

items.name: var destination: MTLCaptureDestination
items.desc: The destination for any captured command data.

items.name: var outputURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL for a file to write the capture data into.
